title: Welcome to My Blog
summary: A short note on what I’ll share here.
content: Welcome! This blog will host short write-ups on AI, research notes, and occasional personal updates.
Feel free to reach out if there’s a topic you’d like me to cover.

title: Math & LaTeX Demo
summary: Testing inline and block LaTeX rendering with KaTeX.
body:
# Math in Markdown with KaTeX

Inline math like $E=mc^2$ and Euler's identity $e^{i\pi}+1=0$.

Block math:

$$\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} dx = \sqrt{\pi}$$

A small matrix:

$$\begin{bmatrix}1 & 2 \\ 3 & 4\end{bmatrix}$$

And some GitHub-flavored Markdown features (lists, code):

- Item one
- Item two

`code-inline` and a fenced block:

```python
import math
print(math.e)
```
